title: Should a kundalini awakened person go for coronavirus vaccination?
description: Answer (1 of 7): People all over the world are having very bad reactions to the vaccination, including death. Many many people. Draw your own conclusions and do your own research. You won't find any answers on regular media because it's all been suppressed.
